SELECT count(*) as totalRow FROM file_import_data_old f LEFT JOIN employee e ON e.id = f.id_employee LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id = f.id_device LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site WHERE s.`status` = 1 AND s.is_delete = 0 AND d.`status` = 1 AND d.is_delete = 0 AND e.`status` = 1
AND f.filename LIKE CONCAT("%",#{keyword}, "%")

SELECT u.*, d.datatablename, d.id_site, d.id_device_type, d.id AS id_device, dg.table_name AS device_group_table, s.table_data_report FROM `file_import_data_old` u LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id = u.id_device LEFT JOIN device_group dg ON d.id_device_group = dg.id LEFT JOIN site s ON s.id = d.id_site WHERE u.id = #{id};
